title: How many movies have been made in Bollywood to date? - Quora

response.answer_text: TOTAL NUMBER OF FILMS RELEASED IN BOLLYWOOD SO FAR, FROM 1920 TO 2020: 10585 FILMS Details starting from 1920 (+/- 5%): From 1920 to 1929: Around 790 films {In 1921, the very first year, around 25 films were released. 1927 was the first year in the history of Bollywood when more than 100 film were released, 1929 was the year in this decade with maximum no of release (around 150)} From 1930 to 1939: Around 1070 film {1935 was the year with maximum number of film (around 165), this was also the decade when first Indian sound film Alam Ara was released and legendary K.L. Saigal started his career. This was also the decade when Himanshu Rai’s Bombay Talkies came into existence}  1940 to 1949: Around 1100 films {1947 was the year with maximum number of films (around 170). This was also the decade when super star like Ashok Kumar, Dev Anand, Raj Kapoor, Dilip Kumar, Madhubala, Gita Bali, Nargis, Suraiya, Kishore Kumar started their career. Makers like Prabhat studios, Homi Wadia, Mehboob Khan also rose to fame in this decade. KISMET, the first Indian film to cross the the figure of Rs. 1 Crore on Box Office was also released in this decade}  1950 to 1959: Around 1020 films { This was the decade when great filmmakers like Bimal Roy, Satyajit Ray, B.R. Chopra and Guru Dutt started their career. Mother India became the first Indian film to be nominated for OSCARS. Sunil Dutt, Rajendra Kumar and Shammi Kapoor also started their careers in this decade.}  1960 to 1969 : Around 1050 Films {This was the decade when Hindi Magnum Opus Mughal-E-Azam was released. The filmmakers like Hrishikesh Mukherjee, G.P. Sippy, Manmohan Desai, Yash Chopra, Basu Bhattacharya and V. Shantaram started their career. The title Super Star came into existence with entry of stars like Dharmendra, Rajesh Khanna and Amitabh Bachchan in this decade.}  1970 to 1979: Around 1100 films {All time blockbuster Sholay released in this decade. Stars like Sanjeev Kumar, Rishi Kapoor, Amzad Khan, Shashi Kapoor, Hema Malini, Jeetendra, Naseeruddin Shah, Amrish Puri and Firoz Khan rose to fame in this period. This was also the decade when filmmakers like Basu Chaterjee, Mahesh Bhatt, Prakash Mehra and Subhash Ghai started their career.}  1980 to 1989: Around 1150 films {80’s was the decade when stars like Salman Khan, Amir Khan, Mithun Chakraborty, Jackie Shroff, Sunny Deol, Meenakshi Seshadri, Madhuri Dixit, Sri Devi, Rekha, Jaya Prada, Sanjay Dutt, Anil Kapoor, Govinda and Raj Babbar made their debuts. Filmmakers like Vidhu Vinod Chopra, David Dhawan, Mukul S Anand, Prakash Jha, Aparna Sen, Suraj Barjatya and Ramsay Brothers started their career.}  1990 to 1999: Around 960 films {90’s launched Shahrukh Khan, Ajay Devgn, Saif Ali Khan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Akshay Kumar, Rani Mukherjee and Kajol. Filmmakers Rajkumar Santoshi, Ram Gopal Verma, Abbas Mastan, Karan Johar, Priyadarshan ( in HIndi films), Ashutosh Gowariker and Sanjay Leela Bhansali also started in 90’s.}  2000 to 2009: Around 1100 films { 21st Century’s first decade gave us stars like Hritik Roshan, Abhishek Bachchan, Kareena Kapoor, Anushka Sharma, Ranbir Kapoor, Shahid Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra, Katrina Kaif, and Deepika Padokone. In this decade filmmakers like Anurag Basu, Rajkumar Hirani, Rohit Shetty, Farah Khan, Vishal Bhardwaj, Zoya Akhtar, Anurag Kashyap, Farhan Akhtar, Sriram Raghvan, and Neeraj Pandey also started making films.}  2010 to 2019: Around 1200 films In last decade we saw stars like Ayushman Khurana, Rajkumar Rao, Vicky Kaushal, Ranveer Singh and Sushant Singh Rajpoot making their debuts. Nitesh Tiwari directed DANGAL, the number one Bollywood films in terms of Box Office collection so far in this decade.  2020: Around 45 films {This decade has just started and it’s first year will always be remember as Corona hit year for Bollywood. Only 45 films could be released in this year so far. English Medium of Irfan Khan was the last film released in theatres. This year will also be remembered as the year when several films were released directly on OTT platforms} Note: The question is about movies made in Bollywood, thus only Hindi films are considered in the calculations. Also mostly notable films and the films released in theatres are consolidated to find the figure. [SOURCE: WIKIPEDIA, IMDB AND SOME ENTERTAINMENT SITES.]

Wow…what a question. It’s hard to answer because Bollywood has been in the film industry for over 100 years now and counting all the films made over those years would be tough. Currently the Bollywood film industry is putting out between 1200 and 1700 films each year, depending upon such things as actor availability, cooperation from weather, releases from The Central Board of Film Certification which is India’s film governing body, and other factors. This is about two to three times the number or films turned out each year by Hollywood. If we were to reduce the amount even to say 1000 films per year and multiply that by the number of years Bollywood has been active, we could guesstimate at about 100,000 films, but that would be a conservative guess. I would guess between 130,000 and 160,000 films.
